liukuri.title: Application
liukuri.descriptionHTML:
This is a web app visualizing the current electricity prices and sources, inspired by exceptionally high electricity prices in 2022. In addition it also features an electricity cost calculator with which you can determine how much your electricity consumption in Finland has cost based on real Fingrid datahub exported data.

The app has been developed by Vesa Nieminen and it has been built using Vaadin.

watchapp.title: Apple Watch Application
watchapp.descriptionHTML: The Apple Watch companion app was created to check the current electricity price in you wrist using data from Liukuri. It is only available in Finland. It is developed and maintained by Sami Ekblad.

design.title: Design
design.description: Design and accessibility improvements by Joacim Päivärinne.

logo.title: Logo
logo.descriptionHTML: The logo has been created by graphical designer Topi Saavalainen.

help.title: Videos
help.liukuri-live-pks-description: Interview of Pohjois-Karjala Sähkö Oy's Niko Malvela.
help.liukuri-presentation-title: Liukuri presentation from 26th of January 2024 in Finnish
help.liukuri-presentation-description: In this video, I go through what Liukuri is and what you can do with it. I briefly talk about the history of the application's creation, delve more into its use, and give general tips. I also introduce the concepts of price fixing and consumption impact and share my own view on what kind of electricity contract makes sense for me in the current world situation.
help.liukuri-presentation-description-2: Apologies for the poor sound quality. I messed up with the microphone choice. Next time the sound will be better.
help.liukuri-how-to-1-description: In the video, I go through the use of the Liukuri.fi calculator with my personal January 2024 consumption file.
